20101231075030.000|20101231075031.000|CC1|MASS DESTRUCTION, BE CLEAR,

20101231081811.000|20101231081813.000|CC1|YOU DON'T HAVE A SENSE FOR      
20101231081813.000|20101231081815.000|CC1|WHY ARE YOU HERE AND WHY YOU    
20101231081815.000|20101231081816.000|CC1|ARE-- WHERE YOU'RE GOING AND    
20101231081816.000|20101231081817.000|CC1|HOW YOU MANAGE THE SHIP,        
20101231081817.000|20101231081819.000|CC1|IT'S A VERY DIFFICULT LIFE      
20101231081819.000|20101231081820.000|CC1|THAT THEY ARE EMBARKED ON.      
20101231081820.000|20101231081822.000|CC1|>> YOU HAD THE CAPACITY TO

20101231081823.000|20101231081824.000|CC1|HAVE THE STUDENTS CHALLENGE

20101231081828.000|20101231081830.000|CC1|>> IF YOU THINK OF YOUR
